product_meta.title: DeLonghi America CGH1020D Livenza All Day Combination Contact Grill and Open Barbecue, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:Contact Grill and Open BarbecueFor home cooks looking to maximize counter space while still being able to flex their cooking chops in the kitchen, the De'Longhi Livenza All-Day Grill with FlexPress System, model CGH1020D, is the perfect appliance. This unique grill features interchangeable sets of high performance grill and griddle plates to help you cook efficiently and healthy - bringing out the best flavors in delicious grilled meats and vegetables and breakfast favorites such as pancakes and bacon. With the unique FlexPress System, cook in a variety of ways such as contact grill, Panini press, full grill, full griddle and half grill/half griddle or even waffle mode (with plates purchased separately), eliminating the need for additional appliances. The Livenza All-Day Grill includes embedded heating elements, which prevent hotspots for a more even cooking process, as well as an integrated drip tray for healthier grilling. The hanging self-adjustable hinge with cool touch handles offers you many different choices for cooking, including the perfect press, without too much pressure, when in the contact setting. The extra wide 9"x15" cooking surface allows you to make multiple dishes for a large family or entertaining. The dedicated app offers a variety of cooking tips and recipes to make any home chef feel like a professional.
feature_bullets: 5 cooking functions: contact grill & panini press, open full grill, open full griddle, half grill half griddle
Removable, dishwasher safe die-cast plates with embedded heating elements
Large cooking surface of 14.5in x 9in (doubles to 14.5in x 18in once opened). Rated voltage/Frequency (V~Hz) - 120 V / 60 Hz
Hanging self adjustable hinge won't crush small sandwiches or large pieces of meat while still cooking it through
Digital control LED panel with two knobs to set the temperature control of the two plates.External dimensions (l x w x h inches): 18 x 14 x 7.5
